text: Erysiphe is a genus of fungi in the family Erysiphaceae. Many of the species in this genus are plant pathogens which cause powdery mildew. ==Species== This genus includes, but is not limited to the following species: * Erysiphe alphitoides * Erysiphe betae * Erysiphe brunneopunctata * Erysiphe cichoracearum * Erysiphe cruciferarum * Erysiphe fernandoae * Erysiphe flexuosa * Erysiphe heraclei * Erysiphe michikoae * Erysiphe pisi * Erysiphe polygoni * Erysiphe syringae ===Former species=== * Blumeria graminis * Uncinula necator ==References== Category:Fungal plant pathogens and diseases Category:Leotiomycetes genera
title: Erysiphe
